name: Harmony Master (Zetram)
description:
Harmony Master is a 2D puzzle, action and platform game. Where you run and jump on platforms and cliffs, while using different tools and collecting items to move forward, while solving puzzles and defeating some enemies.

Team:

Sebastián Herrera:  Game Producer, Gameplay developer

Alejandro López: Gameplay developer

Alejandra Ibarbo: 2D artist

Alejandro Quiceno:  UI artist, Concept artist, 2D artist

David Arrubla: Sound designer/ Composer
